languages.text: "Император даровал мне острый слух, а люди сделали все остальное. Сколько, по-твоему, членов твоего экипажа поспешило на исповедь сразу после прибытия в порт? Сколько времени мне потребовалось, чтобы сложить из их слов истину?"

traits.locale_text: "Император даровал мне острый слух, а люди сделали все остальные. Сколько, по-твоему, членов твоего экипажа поспешило на исповедь сразу после прибытия в порт? Сколько времени мне потребовалось, чтобы сложить из их слов истину? Не стоит недооценивать нас. В Просторе Коронус друзианцы — значит единственные истинно верующие, и наша сила велика".

languages.text: "The Emperor has blessed me with acute hearing, and the people did the rest. How many members of your crew do you think came to confess the moment they arrived in port? How long do you suppose it took me to piece together the truth from their words?"
languages.original_text: "Император даровал мне острый слух, а люди сделали все остальное. Сколько, по-твоему, членов твоего экипажа поспешило на исповедь сразу после прибытия в порт? Сколько времени мне потребовалось, чтобы сложить из их слов истину?"

traits.locale_text: "The Emperor has blessed me with acute hearing, and the people did the rest. How many members of your crew do you think came to confess their sins the moment they arrived in port? How long do you suppose it took for me to piece together the truth from their words? You shouldn't underestimate us. In the Koronus Expanse, being a Drusian means being the one true believer, and our strength is great."

"The Emperor has blessed me with acute hearing, and the people did the rest. How many members of your crew do you think came to confess their sins the moment they arrived in port? How long do you suppose it took for me to piece together the truth from their words? You shouldn't underestimate us. In the Koronus Expanse, being a Drusian means being the one true believer, and our strength is great."

"The Emperor has blessed me with acute hearing, and the people did the rest. How many members of your crew do you think came to confess their sins the moment they arrived in port? How long do you suppose it took me to piece together the truth from their words?"

"The Emperor has blessed me with acute hearing, and the people did the rest. How many members of your crew do you think came to confess their sins the moment they arrived in port? How long do you suppose it took me to piece together the truth from their words?"

"The Emperor has blessed me with acute hearing, and the people did the rest. How many members of your crew do you think came to confess the moment they arrived in port? How long do you suppose it took me to piece together the truth from their words?"

languages.text: “帝皇赐予了我敏锐的听觉，剩下的事情都是人们自发做的。你认为你的船员之中有多少人，在抵达港口的那一刻起，就来进行忏悔？你觉得我花了多长时间，从他们的话中拼凑出了真相？”
languages.original_text: "The Emperor has blessed me with acute hearing, and the people did the rest. How many members of your crew do you think came to confess the moment they arrived in port? How long do you suppose it took me to piece together the truth from their words?"

traits.locale_text: “帝皇赐予了我敏锐的听觉，剩下的事情都是人们自发做的。你认为你的船员之中有多少人，在抵达港口的那一刻起，就来忏悔他们的罪过？你觉得我花了多长时间，从他们的话中拼凑出了真相？”

languages.text: «El Emperador me bendijo con un oído prodigioso y la gente se encargó del resto. ¿Cuántos miembros de su tripulación cree que acudieron a confesarse nada más llegar al puerto? ¿Cuánto tiempo cree que me llevó extraer la verdad de sus palabras?».
languages.original_text: "The Emperor has blessed me with acute hearing, and the people did the rest. How many members of your crew do you think came to confess the moment they arrived in port? How long do you suppose it took me to piece together the truth from their words?"

traits.locale_text: «El Emperador me bendijo con un oído prodigioso y la gente se encargó del resto. ¿Cuántos miembros de su tripulación cree que acudieron a confesar sus pecados nada más llegar al puerto? ¿Cuánto tiempo cree que me llevó extraer la verdad de sus palabras?».

languages.text: 「皇帝は私に素晴らしい聴覚を授けてくださいましたが、多くは民から聞きました。あなたのクルーの何人が、港に着いや否や懺悔しに来たと思いますか？彼らの言葉から真実を導き出すのに、さほど時間はかかりませんでした」
languages.original_text: "The Emperor has blessed me with acute hearing, and the people did the rest. How many members of your crew do you think came to confess the moment they arrived in port? How long do you suppose it took me to piece together the truth from their words?"

traits.locale_text: 「皇帝は私に素晴らしい聴覚を授けてくださいましたが、多くは民から聞きました。あなたのクルーの何人が、港に着いや否や懺悔しに来たと思いますか？彼らの言葉から真実を導き出すのに、さほど時間はかかりませんでした」

languages.text: "Der Imperator hat mich mit einem guten Gehör gesegnet, und den Rest haben die Leute besorgt. Was denkt Ihr wohl, wie viele Eurer Crewmitglieder direkt nach ihrer Ankunft im Hafen die Beichte abgelegt haben ? Wie lange werde ich wohl gebraucht haben, um aus ihren Worten die Wahrheit zusammenzusetzen?"
languages.original_text: "The Emperor has blessed me with acute hearing, and the people did the rest. How many members of your crew do you think came to confess the moment they arrived in port? How long do you suppose it took me to piece together the truth from their words?"

traits.locale_text: "Der Imperator hat mich mit einem guten Gehör gesegnet, und den Rest haben die Leute besorgt. Was denkt Ihr wohl, wie viele Eurer Crewmitglieder mir direkt nach ihrer Ankunft im Hafen ihre Sünden gebeichtet haben? Wie lange werde ich wohl gebraucht haben, um aus ihren Worten die Wahrheit zusammenzusetzen?"

languages.text: « L'Empereur m'a doté d'une ouïe particulièrement fine, et les gens ont fait le reste. À votre avis, combien de membres de votre équipage ont accouru pour se confesser dès leur arrivée ? Combien de temps croyez-vous qu'il m'a fallu pour découvrir la vérité en les écoutant ? »
languages.original_text: "The Emperor has blessed me with acute hearing, and the people did the rest. How many members of your crew do you think came to confess the moment they arrived in port? How long do you suppose it took me to piece together the truth from their words?"

traits.locale_text: « L'Empereur m'a doté d'une ouïe particulièrement fine, et les gens ont fait le reste. À votre avis, combien de membres de votre équipage ont accouru pour confesser leurs péchés dès leur arrivée ? Combien de temps croyez-vous qu'il m'a fallu pour découvrir la vérité en les écoutant ? »

languages.text: "İmparator bana keskin bir işitme duyusu bahsetmiştir. İnsanlar da gerisini hallediverdi. Limana iner inmez mürettebatından kaç kişi bana günah çıkarmaya gelmiştir sence? Onların anlattıklarını kafamda birleştirip gerçeğe ulaşmam ne kadar sürmüştür?"
languages.original_text: "The Emperor has blessed me with acute hearing, and the people did the rest. How many members of your crew do you think came to confess the moment they arrived in port? How long do you suppose it took me to piece together the truth from their words?"

traits.locale_text: "İmparator bana keskin bir duyma kabiliyeti bahşetmiş ve gerisini de insanlar halletti. Limana iner inmez mürettebatından kaç kişi bana günah çıkarmaya geldi sence? Onların anlattıklarını kafamda birleştirip gerçeğe ulaşmam ne kadar sürdü sanıyorsun?"
